A set of latest best practices packed in Gulp tasks

Documentation is still work in progress, stay tuned!

You are welcome to contribute by reporting an issue or creating pull request.

Getting started

Welcome to Starter Project, the easiest way to implement latest best practices to your website. It doesn't matter if you have an existing project or you start from the scratch; you can use this package to meet all your needs.

Installation

Install using npm: npm install starter-project --save.

Commands

Run command gulp dev for developing mode.

Run command gulp for deployment mode.

Configuration

Configure Starter Project to meet your project requirements. Open config.json to see all available options.

Features

Benefit from powerful features, like Browser-sync, Sass, Stylelint, Babel, Pug template engine, Image Minification, Critical CSS, Sourcemaps, and many more.

Support

Share on Twitter.

Star on Github.

Contribute: report an issue or create pull request.

Changelog

Changelog available in CHANGELOG.md file.

Powered by Starter Project.
